title: Will my hextech crafting materials be deleted when the season ends?!?!?!??!?!
body: I just wanted to know if they'll be deleted when the season ends

replies.body: My bad, it looks like both worlds and project materials expired per the [Worlds ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift)page.   Notifications were also presented when mousing over the item in the hextech crafting content.  Project items were disenchantable until the expiration.  Thanks for helping to clear things up!

Only championship jewels are slated to expire, per the [worlds 2016 ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)guide.  Everything else should remain in tact!  Let me know if you have any questions.

If I may ask, why weren't we notified that the Project stuff would disappear?
I had 11 shards and a Zed fragment (the locked up one), along with the three locked summoner icons that just went "poof."
I kept it that way to remember the event since I didn't want to unlock the zed shard yet.
We even got no essence for it from the looks of it.

While Worlds jewels expired on their own, the Project content had to be disenchanted manually.  Those details were announced and also provided in the project guide under the [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ#h4) section.  From looking at your specific account, I see you still have your blueprints, cores, and augments in your inventory.  Hope that helps clear things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RgMOfzNL,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-08T16:50:10.138+0000)
>
> While Worlds jewels expired on their own, the Project content had to be disenchanted manually.  Those details were announced and also provided in the project guide under the [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ#h4) section.  From looking at your specific account, I see you still have your blueprints, cores, and augments in your inventory.  Hope that helps clear things up!

My project materials also were deleted, i had the three first trike icons, a couple cores, and cache fragments

O rip, I was talking about my alt account WaningSn0w, sorry^^"
I'm too used to posting on this one.
